Plot: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.
Title: The Act of Killing
Actors: Anwar Congo, Herman Koto, Syamsul Arifin, Ibrahim Sinik
tomatoConsensus: Raw, terrifying, and painfully difficult to watch, The Act of Killing offers a haunting testament to the edifying, confrontational power of documentary cinema.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 50 wins & 40 nominations.
